casebody.data:
In the Matter of HURWITZ COMPANY, Inc., Bankrupt. Abram E. Hurwitz, Petitioner-Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 17, 1926.) No. 327. Louis Rosenberg, of New York City (Nathan April, of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner. McDonnell & Lebett, of New York City, for trustee in bankruptcy.

Before HOUGH, MANTON, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed, with costs.
